goal.tools.logging

Class StringsLogRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.logging.LogRecord
      • goal.tools.logging.GOALLogRecord
        • goal.tools.logging.StringsLogRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InfoLog

    public class StringsLogRecord
extends GOALLogRecord
    Class representing a LogRecord with a parameterized message. Does not build the message until it is published and formatted by the StringsLogRecord.Formatter.
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringsLogRecord

        public StringsLogRecord(java.util.logging.Level level,
                java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Object... params)
        Creates a new LogRecord with a parameterized log message
        Parameters:
        level - The level of the new log record.
        message - The message to log. May include format parts (eg: "%1$s : $2$d").
        params - The parameters of the message to log.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormatter

        public java.util.logging.Formatter getFormatter()
        Specified by:
        getFormatter in class GOALLogRecord
        Returns:
        A Formatter to properly format this record.
